Reloadly - Auto Website Refresh

Reloadly is a free, lightweight Chrome extension that lets you automatically refresh any website at customizable intervals. Whether you're tracking live updates, monitoring dashboards, or simply need to keep a session active, Reloadly makes it effortless to stay updated.

Key Features:
Custom Refresh Intervals: Choose how often the page refreshes—every few seconds or minutes.
Pause and Resume Anytime: Start or stop automatic refreshing with just one click.
Refresh Active Tabs Only: Reloads the active tab, leaving other tabs unaffected.
Simple and Lightweight: Easy to use with minimal impact on browser performance.
Secure and Free: No data collection, no intrusive permissions, and 100% free to use.
How to Use:
Click the Reloadly icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Enter your desired refresh interval (e.g., 10 seconds).
Hit the start button and let Reloadly handle the rest!
Reloadly is perfect for real-time tracking of stock prices, auction bids, social feeds, or any page that requires frequent updates.

Say goodbye to manual refreshing! Install Reloadly today and enjoy the convenience of staying updated—for free!
